text: Heavy Petting Zoo is the sixth studio album by American punk rock band, NOFX. Heavy Petting Zoo was released on January 31, 1996. The producers of the album were Ryan Greene and NOFX. The title of the album is a combination of the words heavy petting and petting zoo. ==Songs== Category:1996 albums Category:NOFX albums Category:Punk albums
title: Heavy Petting Zoo
